Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 28th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2019...
Injured on 4/14/2019 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 9/1/2019 with a Bruised Heel, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/17/2020 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 4-5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 8/24/2020, off James Borden (CIN)...
Injured on 8/12/2021 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 4 days...
Traded from Philadelphia to Detroit on 3/2/2022 (Going to PHI: P Francisco Cordero Jr.. Going to DET: SS Bobby Speck, LF Daniel Delee)...
Traded from Detroit to St. Louis (C) on 5/16/2022 (Going to DET: SS Robert Guerriero. Going to STL: LF Daniel Delee, SS Bobby Speck, 3B Adolfo Dinh, P Carl Harden)...
Injured on 6/21/2022 with a Fractured Hand, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 9/2/2022 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 4/4/2023 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Hit first career homerun on 8/18/2023, off Tim Zimmermann (BRO)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2023, hitting .381 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2023...
